title: kETTadellAm tarum
sahitya:
kETTadellAm tarum kalai arasi nAn pATTisaikka udavum tamizh arasi ivaL


anupallavi

  vATTamara mana vINaiyai mITTuvAL vAnagamEviDum tEn amudUTTuvAL


caraNam    karpanaiyAm inbak-kanavura seivAL kavin malart-tEn enak-kavi mazhai peivAL
arputamAga nal arivinait-tUNDuvAL anburuvAgi en nenjinait-tINDuvAL
